data.text: Eka Elifaz ja-Teman nopenjo niya,
“Bende ngʼama riek nyalo dwoko ji gi paro manono
Bende onyalo mino wach gi weche maonge tiendgi,
In to inyoso chuny ji mondo kik giluor Nyasaye
Richo ma isetimo ema omiyo iwuoyo alanda kamano;
Wecheni iwuon ema ngʼadoni bura, to ok an,
“Iparo ni in e ngʼat mane okuong nywol e piny?
Bende ichiko iti ne rieko mar Nyasaye?
Angʼo mingʼeyo ma wan ok wangʼeyo?
Joma yie wigi otwi lwar kod joma hikgi ngʼeny
Hoch ma Nyasaye hoyigo
Angʼo momiyo iseweyo chunyi oteri mabor,
momiyo koro iwuoyo gi Nyasaye ka in gi mirima
“Dhano to en angʼo madimi obed ngʼama ler,
Ka Nyasaye ok ogeno kata malaika mage,
to koro ere kaka dodew dhano adhana ma timbene richo kendo okethore,
“Chikuru itu uwinja mondo olernu tiend wach;
gik ma joma riek osehulo,
ma gin jogo mane omi piny kendgi giwegi
Ngʼat ma timbene richo
Koko mag masiche opongʼo ite kendo jomecho biro monje
Ok onyal tony mowuogi e mudho;
Orundore koni gi koni nimar en chiemb achudhe adier;
Masiche malich ogoye gi kihondko,
mano ema notimre ne ngʼat ma kamano nikech othiano ni Nyasaye
koringo mondo odhi omonje
“Kata obedo ni ngʼatni chwe
to obiro dak e mier mokethore,
Koro ok obi bedo gi mwandu,
Ok notony e masira,
Kik ogalre koketo genone kuom gima onge tich
Obiro neno makne kapod ndalone oromo,
Obiro chalo gi yiend mzabibu motengʼ olembene mapok ochiek piny
Nikech riwruok mar joma ok lem ok nyal nyago gimoro
Gin joma kelo chandruok kendo timo timbe maricho;
